subject: Question about HS Pro Shifter (H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter)
description_text:
When the shifter is in sequential mode, is there a spring somewhere inside the shifter body that will provide a return-to-center after a shift? Or is the mechanism built into the SQ Serial Block Assembly?

Thanks,
Scott

conversations.body_text: Hi Scott Borders,  After replacing the sequential shifter components, the HS Pro can automatically return to center when shifting up or down.Â
